text: (upbeat music)

- Salesforce is all about
customer relationship management,

and we create the software
that our customers use
to manage their customer relationships.
And it's all about establishing trust
between us and our customer
and our customers and their customer.
We wanted to move into the public cloud

because we get in the
innovation that AWS is bringing
to that space.

We can consume that and we
can then focus our energy

on developing our customer
relationship software
for our customers.

It also allows us to much
more rapidly move locally
where the customers are

to support the increased state
of residency that we have

that our customers are
having to respond to.

We've deployed in nine
new countries this year.
To build and deploy nine new data centers,
we wouldn't have that scale.
So our ability to scale globally
is really one of the key reasons
that we're doing Hyperforce
and that we're doing it with AWS.
Hyperforce is now really become

part of how Salesforce
goes through the market

and how we address our customer
trust and customer success.
